summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of the Inventory Management System. All backend APIs and frontend features are working correctly. The complete inventory update workflow has been verified: create products → create warehouses/bins → create stock receipts → create adjustments → create issues/transfers → verify inventory calculations.

design_issues.component: Dialog components (Products, Warehouses, Bins, Stock Moves, Adjustments)
design_issues.issue: Console warnings about missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent
design_issues.impact: Accessibility warning only, no functional impact

passed_tests: Backend: Create product with code, name, description, unit
Backend: Create warehouse with code, name, location
Backend: Create bin linked to warehouse
Backend: Get bins filtered by warehouse
Backend: Get inventory filtered by product
Backend: Get inventory filtered by warehouse
Frontend: Dashboard loads with stat cards (products, warehouses, total stock, low stock items)
Frontend: Create bin linked to warehouse
Frontend: Inventory displays with product and warehouse details
Frontend: Navigate to Stock Moves page
Frontend: Create stock receipt via form
Frontend: Stock move appears in history
Frontend: Inventory updates after stock moves and adjustments
Frontend: Dashboard shows recent stock moves
Frontend: Low stock items highlighting (bg-orange-50 for quantity < 10)
